steps.description-of-code:
Create a new file in
    your preferred programming language
Define th√© template strings and any other constant values you will use
Define the functions you will need, such as a function to read the file and a function to write the new file
Call the function to read the file and store the contents in a variable
Split the contents of the file into individual templates using the newline character as the delimiter
Iterate through the list of templates
Write the transformed template to a new file
